For recipes, I shared links at the end of this post. Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Regular rice - Sona masoori - 240 gms
  • Tomatoes ğŸ…Â - 5 - 250 gms
  • Onion - Medium sized - sliced
  • Mint leaves - 15 - Finely chopped
  • Coriander leaves - 1/2 cup - finely chopped
  • Cloves - 5
  • Cinnamon pieces - 4
  • Bay leaves - 2
  • Cardamom - 2
  • Mustard seeds - 1 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Urad dal / Skinless black gram - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Chana dal / Bengal gram - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Curry leaves - 8
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Green chillies - 3
  • Black Pepper corns - 10
  • Ginger pieces - 8 - 1/2 Tb sp - chopped
  • Garlic cloves - 4 - chopped
  • Poppy seeds - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Oil - 1 Tb sp
  • Butter - 3 Tb sp
  • Water - 480 ml ( to cook rice )
Procedure: Pre-preparation: Rice:
  • Wash Rice and soak them in water for 15 minutes
Masala paste:
  • In a mixer add poppy seeds, green chillies, ginger, garlic cloves, pepper corns , 3 cloves & 2 Small cinnamon pieces
  • Blend into fine paste and keep aside
Process of making Tomato ğŸ…Â Rice :
  • Heat pan add oil & butter over medium heat
  • Add cloves, cinnamon, cardamom, bay leaves, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, Bengal gram. Saute 2 minutes
  • Next add chopped onion, curry leaves & Saute 2 mins
  • Then Add blended paste and saute more 2 minutes
  • Next Add chopped coriander and mint leaves, Saute 1 minute.
  • Add chopped tomatoes ğŸ…Â & let it cook 5 minutes then add salt, red chilly powder, Garam masala powder, turmeric powder & cook more 5 minutes.
  • Mix well & Turn off heat
  • Next Step is add soaked rice in cooking vessel then add prepared tomato masala along with water
  • Mix well & cook. If you wish to prepare in pressure cooker then cook for 2 whistles and turn off heat. Tomato rice tastes great in both ways ğŸ‘
  • Serve with Raita or potato chips
